traits.Evasion: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
traits.Magic Resistance: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Turn Immunity: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.Multiattack: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.
actions.Scimitar: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.
